title: Desus & Mero | Lily Allen | The Department of Veterans Affairs: The Check In
description:
Seth takes a break from breaking news to check in on the possible privatization of the Department of Veterans Affairs and Trump's promise to fix the agency.

Then, Desus & Mero talk about performing in front of a live audience at the Apollo, extended family coming out of the woodwork and all things politics. They also continue the conversation exclusively for this podcast with Late Night producer Henry Melcher.

As a special podcast bonus, singer Lily Allen stopped by the podcast while she was a musical guest on Late Night. She spoke with producer Sarah Jenks-Daly and talent executive Jeremiah Silva about her new album "No Shame" and the journey she experienced on the way to her current moment.
